availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, attorney and judge. New Hampshire native. Married to Corrilla Whitaker. Father of John L. Whitaker and Emery C. Whitaker. Attorney and judge in Mason County in 1860. Partner in law with W. P. Conwell until March 11, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 102.
Maysville Weekly Bulletin, January 22, 1863, p. 3.
Find A Grave, "Emery Whitaker (1816-1898)," Memorial #52811055, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/52811055 (accessed April 17, 2018).
